data.paragraph: Spectrum Reach is the marketing platform of choice to help your business reach new heights, without breaking your budget.
data.heading: Powered By Your Potential

data.paragraph: With the majority of consumers using multiple devices throughout the day, it’s never been more essential to have a multi-screen advertising strategy. When combined, TV and Digital work together to make your ads more memorable, even doubling your message recall when the same ad runs on both TV and online.
data.heading: The New Media Landscape
Top programming. Engaged audiences.
data.paragraph: Get your message in front of the right people, at the right time. We’ll place your business next to the shows.

items.heading:
Bravo
Flipping Out
items.paragraph:
Just when America’s favorite house flipper thinks his life could not be any more chaotic, Jeff Lewis embarks on the most unpredictable challenge yet – fatherhood. With no shortage of design work, tight deadlines and outrageous clients, tempers flare and antics commence as his two very different worlds collide.

 

Airs: Thursdays, 9-10pm ET/PT, 8/17-10/19/17

items.heading:
ESPN
Monday Night Football
items.paragraph:
Monday returns as football’s favorite day of the week capping off each Fantasy Football round. Monday Night Football was the #1 telecast of the night 15 of 16 weeks among all key adult and male demographics last season.*

 

Airs: Now through 12/25

 

Source: Scarborough USA+ 2017 Release 1 (De15-Ap16) Adults 18+ who watch Monday Night Football. *ESPN MediaZone, 12/29/16.

items.heading:
A&E
The Lowe Files
items.paragraph:
The Lowe Files follows Rob Lowe and his two sons, Matthew and John Owen, as they travel through the country to explore infamous unsolved mysteries, a curiosity that Rob has had since his early childhood days and has now been passed down to his boys.

 

Airs: Wednesdays, 10-11pm ET/PT, 8/2-9/20/17

 

Source: Scarborough USA+ 2016 Release 2 Total (Aug 2015 - Nov 2016); Base: Total Adults 18+

items.heading:
USA
The Sinner
items.paragraph:
The Sinner follows a young mother (Jessica Biel) who, when overcome by an inexplicable fit of rage, commits a startling act of violence and to her horror has no idea why.

 

Airs: Wednesdays, 10-11pm ET/PT, 8/2-9/20/17

 

Source: Scarborough USA+ 2016 Release 2 Total (Aug 2015 - Nov 2016); Base: Total Adults 18+

callToActions.heading: Television
callToActions.paragraph: The foundation of a solid brand is built on TV, the most powerful video platform ever created.

callToActions.heading: Audience Extension
callToActions.paragraph: Extend your campaign and make your message stronger across every screen, everywhere your customers are, no matter what.
